Current State issued photo ID will be required for admission. âBubble-Liciousâ at The Venetian â Thursday, April 18: 7-10 p.m. Guests to Bubble-Licious will enjoy an evening of exquisite champagnes, sparkling wines and champagne cocktails accompanied by delectable cuisine from The Venetianâs celebrated restaurants. âSake Feverâ at The Mirage â Friday, April 19: 7-10 p.m.Sake Fever, this celebration of the most authentic Asian beverages and cuisine, will immerse guests in the tropical oasis of The Mirageâs resort pool.âGrand Tastingâ at Paris Las Vegas â Saturday, April 20: 7-10 p.m.The main event and a Las Vegas tradition, UNLVinoâs Grand Tasting features an incredible collection of international wines, specialty beers and craft cocktails complemented with cuisine prepared by UNLV studentsâBAR-b-qâ at Cleveland Clinic Lou Ruvo Center for Brain Health â Sunday, April 21: 11 a.m.-2 p.m. UNLVino debuts a mixology-focused, star-chef-studded BAR-b-q, featuring cuisine from celebrity chefs and craft-cocktail creations by Master Mixologist Francesco Lafranconi.
